text: I could comment on the extension page, but I'm wondering whether that is useful? Maybe instead we could just encourage more folks to leave a review, so that a few outliers don't harm our average so much? For example, there are 514 folks in this channel. Why don't some of you, if you like the extension, leave a review at <https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=julialang.language-julia> :slightly_smiling_face:

attachments.title: Julia - Visual Studio Marketplace
